name: SM-SOURCE
subtitle: All my apps in one place.
description: Welcome to my source! Here you'll find all of my apps.

apps.name: Spotify++
apps.subtitle: Spotify with free premium, and extra UI features
apps.localizedDescription:
Spotify++ contants a tweak that activates Premium. As well as a number of tweaks to customise the UI and improve the overall user experience.

Here are the following tweaks:

• Spotilife - Premium for free.

• Sposify - A Tweak to customize your Spotify App UI and expand functionalities.

• Volify - Adds a volume slider to Spotify.

• SpotifyAllowSetting - Allows you to access all of the settings in Spotify that are normally disabled when someone else is playing music from another device.

• SpotifyNoPodcasts - Hides Podcasts from from Home and Library

• SpotifyHighQuality - Enables ’Very High’ Quality in Audio Quality settings

•TrueShuffle - Enables true random shuffling (Spotify prioritizes Songs you have listened to more often by default)

• Spoticentre - Centres the song/artist in now playing (Only working on some devices)

versions.localizedDescription:
• EeveeSpotify now supports LRCLIB and Musixmatch time-synced lyrics sources! You can select your preferred source in the tweak settings
• Lyrics colors are now normalized
• Fixed Genius issue where the tweak would pick a translation instead of the original lyrics

privacy.name: AppleMusic
privacy.usageDescription: This will let you play your imported music on Spotify.

privacy.name: BluetoothAlways
privacy.usageDescription: This lets you unlock new ways of interacting with other devices compatible with Spotify via Bluetooth.

privacy.name: BluetoothPeripheral
privacy.usageDescription: This lets you unlock new ways of interacting with other devices compatible with Spotify via Bluetooth.

privacy.name: Camera
privacy.usageDescription: This lets you scan Spotify Codes.

privacy.name: FaceID
privacy.usageDescription: This lets you set access restrictions using Face ID.

privacy.name: HealthShare
privacy.usageDescription: Spotify will use HealthKit data to provide personalised audio recommendations for your workouts.

privacy.name: HealthUpdate
privacy.usageDescription: Spotify will use HealthKit data to provide personalised audio recommendations for your workouts.

privacy.name: LocalNetwork
privacy.usageDescription: This lets you listen on different devices. Spotify will also get access to local audio files.

privacy.name: Microphone
privacy.usageDescription: This lets you control Spotify using your voice.

privacy.name: Motion
privacy.usageDescription: We will use this to understand which audio motivates you most.

privacy.name: PhotoLibraryAdd
privacy.usageDescription: This lets you save images to your Photo Library.

privacy.name: PhotoLibrary
privacy.usageDescription: This lets you select images from your Photo Library.

privacy.name: UserTracking
privacy.usageDescription: Your data will be used to deliver personalized ads or content to you.
